attributes.action: Enforce the smoking ban at the G20 summit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foreign dignitaries attending the G20 summit in London next month will be exempt from the smoking ban, it has been revealed.
While I am a smoker I believe there should be exceptions to the smoking ban, but believe if we the general public have to except the smoking ban then it should apply to government officials as well,
below is an extract from a report from a newspaper regarding the lifting of the smoking ban for g20 summit.

The leniency required an amendment to the legislation enforcing the ban.
Certain smoking rooms will now be allowed in the Excel Exhibition Centre in Docklands in east London during the summit.
